CustomField.description: Use this checkbox to confirm that the associated License is the one that you wish to convert to production status. When checked and saved it will create a Customer record and a draft Service Order record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this checkbox to confirm that the associated License is the one that you wish to convert to production status. When checked and saved it will create a Customer record and a draft Service Order record.
CustomField.label: Confirm License / Create Draft Order
